    match: {
      "user.id": "kimchy",
    },

  highlight: {
    number_of_fragments: 3,
    fragment_size: 150,
    fields: {
      body: {
        pre_tags: ["<em>"],
        post_tags: ["</em>"],
      },
      "blog.title": {
        number_of_fragments: 0,
      },
      "blog.author": {
        number_of_fragments: 0,
      },
      "blog.comment": {
        number_of_fragments: 5,
        order: "score",

    },

});
